job.title: Manager, Statistical Programming (FTE/Remote)
job.description: pClinical Resource Network CRN is working with a growing bicoastal oncology pharma that has an immediate need for an FTEbased Manager of Statistical Programming The selected candidate will generate TLGsreports create SDTMADaM datasets develop macros validate output support ISSsISEs and contribute to in houseoutsourced studies Our client prefers local or quasi local candidates but is open to the right 100 WFH candidate as wellppbrppstronguEssential Duties and ResponsibilitiesustrongpulliServe as Leader for all SAS Programming activities liliManage resource allocation and budgeting for assigned projectsliliResolve issues for complex SAS programming dutiesliliInteract with global regulatory bodiesliliCollaborate with CROsliliDevelop MacrosliliKey contributor in the development of new processes or revision of existing processesliliProfessional development to enhance knowledge skills communication scientific methodology operational efficiency and compliance with policies regulations and corporate standards and processesliulpbrppstronguRequired Education and ExperienceustrongpulliBachelors degree in Computer Science MathStatistics or related degreelili57 years of Clinical Statistical Programming experience in a CRO or sponsor environment liliStrong TLF SDTM and ADaM experience liliExperience working in a Lead Programming capacityliliPrevious line management experience preferredliliPrevious oncology andor submissions experience is a major plus but not requiredliulpbrppstrongIf this position sounds like a good fit for you Apply Nowstrongp
